intro: Nolana humifusa subsp. spathulata, commonly known as the broad-leafed nolana, is a low-growing perennial plant native to southern South America. It thrives in sandy or rocky soils and is adapted to arid or semi-arid environments. Nolana humifusa subsp. spathulata is often used in native plant gardens for its ornamental value and ecological benefits.
